column1: mildred elberta warren| mildred elberta warren
column4: june 13 at laurel heights home for the elderly. she leaves behind two brothers
column5: claude marvin warren of london and george clayton warren of cleveland
column7: randy siler warren and wife robyn; one niece
column8: cindy ann martin and husband stephen; great-nephews
column15: plus a host of other family and friends to mourn her passing. funeral services for mildred elberta warren will be conducted on tuesday
column17: at 1:00 p. m. in the chapel of house-rawlings funeral home with bro. homer johnson and bro. ronnie owens officiating. burial will follow in the rough creek cemetery. the family will receive friends after 6:00 p. m. on monday
column19: also at the funeral home. upcoming events. visitationjun 15. 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm house-rawlings funeral home510 east 4th street. london
